text: Uye kana maramba madzimai uye vave pedyo kuzadzikisa nguva yavo (kutevera katatu), vatorei mune zvakanaka kana vasiyei mune zvakanaka. Asi musave munovatora kuti muve munovatambudza, muchipfurikidza murairo; uye wese anodaro, zvirokwazvo anenge azvitadzira pachake. Uye musava munotora mitemo yaAllah sedambe, asi rangarirai makomborero aAllah kwamuri, uye neGwaro nehungwaru (Sunnah) zvavakakutumidzirai vachikuyambirai nazvo. Uye ityai Allah, uye moziva kuti Allah vanoziva zvinhu zvose zvakanyanya
